ygData.subject: Re: Recharging Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: not about recharing weapon but Fesse u wanna exchange a charred guardian shield for that boots? ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific
ygData.messageBody:
not about recharing weapon but Fesse u wanna exchange a charred
guardian shield for that boots?
